alert.note: Alert for Tavaputs Plateau (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 12:01PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Uintah County through 1230 PM MDT... At 1201 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 48 miles northwest of Fruita, or 52 miles northeast of Green River, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Uintah County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
